channel.title: Basic commands like help and rules, and adding npc's

item.title: Basic commands like help and rules, and adding npc's
item.dc:creator: @John_X John_X
item.description:
@John_X wrote:

Hello.

Firstly i am a beginner of editing servers, and I can have a bit problem of where to place a code piece. If answering please show where to put or place the code, thanks.

1st problem : basic commands like help and rules

What do i want to build? Simply an pkinformation, uh in same format som help and rules.

I know i can search the code, and i found but it maybe need som editing and i don’t know how, but you maybe can help changing the code and where i should place it?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("modinfo") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@The rules of Allstar-Scape", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("How to Become Mod/Admin", 8145); sendQuest("----", 8147); sendQuest("1. Respect all other players!", 8148); sendQuest("2. Respect Owners,Admins and Mods", 8149); sendQuest("3. Do not start fights with other players", 8150); sendQuest(" just simply tell an Owner or Admin.", 8151); sendQuest("4. Help other players if they need help.", 8152); sendQuest("5. Play on Server alot.", 8153); sendQuest("5. Higher chance if you register on forums at", 8154); sendQuest("allstarscapeforums.smfforfree2.com and stay active", 8155); sendQuest("_____________________________________________________", 8156); sendQuest("If you follow all of these rules you will be fine", 8157); sendQuest("Just follow these and you will become a mod or admin", 8158); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

2st problem

I want to add a npc in “Pkbox” that stands there and says “NO LOOTING OR PJING!!” But i dont know how to place it i dont know how i can get id’s

And i have no idea what kind of code i need!!

(Im using allstar-scape source).

Read full topic
